title: J2EE Misconfiguration: Data Transmission Without Encryption
overview: Information sent over a network can be compromised while in transit. An attacker may be able to read or modify the contents if the data are sent in plaintext or are weakly encrypted.
remediation: ::PHASE:System Configuration:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:The application configuration should ensure that SSL or an encryption mechanism of equivalent strength and vetted reputation is used for all access-controlled pages.::
